snippet: From The Lively Morgue: July 4, 1952: Chicago. As part of its coverage of the Republican National Convention, The Times ran a full program and a chart showing the positions that delegates would occupy on the convention floor.
abstract: From The Lively Morgue: July 4, 1952: Chicago. As part of its coverage of the Republican National Convention, The Times ran a full program and a chart showing the positions that delegates would occupy on the convention floor.

headline.main: From The Lively Morgue: Republican National Convention, Chicago, 1952
